name: Acme Productivity Suite
description: An integrated suite for task management, collaboration, and reporting. Ideal for small to medium teams.

name: Acme Analytics Pro
description: Advanced analytics platform with dashboards, anomaly detection, and real-time reporting.

name: Acme CRM Enterprise
description: Customer relationship management tool with pipeline tracking, automation, and integrations with email and chat.

name: Acme Marketing Hub
description: Marketing automation tool for campaigns, A/B testing, email marketing, and lead scoring.

name: Acme Helpdesk
description: Customer support and ticketing system with knowledge base integration and live chat support.
